attributes.additional_details: Sheffield young carers are having to make serious changes. The changes include, current young carers are having to leave so that other young carers can come into the project for help. The current young carers are worrying that after the have to leave, there caring role will get worse. All this is because of money, they cant afford to get more staff into the project. For the very first time they have a really long waiting list. What is going to happen is the future young carers who come into the project only get to stay for a maximum of 6 months. They really need help to prevent this from happening. All current young carers are really upset and scared about he changes. Please help
